column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Anytime a special event in my life occurs
column2: Bavette's is where I want to celebrate it at.   The space is stunning!   It has a speakeasy feel to it without being pretentious.  We started off with the seafood tower which was excellent!!!   The lobster claws were my favorite.   Juicy
column3: sweet and succulent!  For my main
column4: the dry aged rib-eye was out of this world.  It was so tender that I was able to cut it with just a fork
column5: and also perfectly seasoned.   Our waiter was knowledgeable from our cocktails to our dessert.   It's THE Chicago steakhouse of my dreams.   Thank you so much for existing in my city!
